publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3664 Dennis Canavan: Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya—That the Parliament deplores the mass killings of innocent people and other atrocities which have taken place in Chechnya and believes that the UK Government should use its Presidency of the European Union to facilitate negotiations between Chechnya and the Russian Federation to try to bring about a peaceful and just solution to the dispute.

S2M-3664 Dennis Canavan: Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya—That the Parliament deplores the mass killings of innocent people and other atrocities which have taken place in Chechnya and believes that the UK Government should use its Presidency of the European Union to facilitate negotiations between Chechnya and the Russian Federation to try to bring about a peaceful and just solution to the dispute.
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Michael Matheson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Campbell Martin*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Eleanor Scott*, Alasdair Morgan*, Brian Adam*, Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Linda Fabiani*, Mark Ballard*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Carolyn Leckie*, Margo MacDonald*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Shiona Baird*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Mr John Swinney*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Rosie Kane*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3664 Peace and Justice for the People of Chechnya (lodged on 30 November 2005) Frances Curran*
